00086 
00087 void CCredits::process()
00088 {
00089  mp_Map->animateAllTiles();
00090  
00091  if(m_timer<2) m_timer++;
00092  else
00093  {
00094   m_timer=0;
00095   if(m_scrolly>-54*8) m_scrolly--;
00096   else
00097    m_scrolly = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution().h;
00098  }
00099  
00100  for(int j=0 ; j<54 ; j++)
00101  {
00102   if(m_scrolly+(j<<3) > -8 && m_scrolly+(j<<3) < g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution().h)
00103    g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont( g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, m_scrolltext[j], m_mid[j], m_scrolly+(j<<3), true);
00104  }
00105  
00106  if( g_pInput->getPressedAnyKey() )
00107   m_destroy_me = true;
00108 }
